main event: A witness reported seeing a UFO over the Sassafras River in Maryland on 17 May 1967 at around 11:30 PM, which they observed to have flashing lights and made a sudden maneuver before disappearing.
interesting points: The UFO lasted for 2 to 3 minutes in sight, initially appearing as a bright light about 500 to 1000 feet above the horizon., The object flew in a straight line and executed a rapid 90-degree turn before it vanished., Witness described distinct flashing light sequences, suggesting a structured object rather than a simple light phenomenon., Observers reported the sky was clear at the time of the sighting., A private citizen provided the report, indicating a non-military source of observation.
witness description: A private citizen, observed the UFO while being a licensed private pilot.
